strapiJob.title: Snack Baristas
strapiJob.description:
We're looking for Snack Baristas who are obsessed with ensuring our guests have an amazing experience every time they are in our store. They will conduct sales transactions, have a deep knowledge of our products and ingredients, and work behind the bar to make and serve food items like smoothies and breakfast bowls. Previous restaurant, bar, grocery store, or coffee shop experience preferred.


Why should you work at Snack Lab? We offer competitive base pay plus tips. Youâ€™ll get to be a part of a company actively working to positively impact our community through healthy eating and encouragement. You get to come to work and be a part of a great team! We offer employee discounts on food and free meals with each shift.


Competitive pay- hourly PLUS tips. Must have daytime availability at least 3-4 days Monday-Saturday.
